author: Anjana George
title: Behind the scenes of 'Kohinoor' song, 'Hementhamen...'
text:
As 'Hemanthamen...' from 'Kohinoor' tops the chartbusters, Rahul Raj, the composer shares an exclusive picture clicked while recording the song, on his Facebook with an interesting caption.
Thus goes it, "This was what happened at Hemandamen recording session!!!
Producer Sajin Jaffar massaging my head while contemplating the song budget at the same time emotionally blackmailing me ...hehe
and Vijay Yesudas playing with Asif Ali 's baby so that he will stay away from my eyes and hence escape from further grilling from me when he gets behind the mic and other producer Brijeesh Mohamed thinking what the hell is going on,Director Vinay Govind is thinking "ithu vallathum innu nadakkumo" and recordist Hari Shankar is going inside...do i look like jesus christ in "The Last Supper". Script writer Salil Menon is also probably thinking.." ithaano paattu...hum".
Other script writer saar Ranjeet Kamala Sankar went for a pee or smoke or whatever (Sic)."
